description: NTS Map:92B11.  Steep 45-60min climb to a fabulous view of the Saanich inlet and the Malahat. Huge park--you can descend the same direction you came up or go right over the mountain and have someone pick you up on the otherside. Compact dirt trail.  At the base is mountain biking trails. Also a trail down to the ocean and a sea kayak launching area down the road.
directions: West Saanich Road to Wallace Drive to Willis Point Road left on Durrance Road.
title: Mt. Work
